title: Cognitive Engagement Teaching Method Design for Improving Mass Measurement Estimation Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical mathematics competency enhancement program for general citizens

learning_goals: Learners can estimate the mass of various everyday objects within ±10% error margin by comparing them to a reference object
Learners can systematically apply strategies to solve complex mass estimation problems using hierarchical scaffolding
Learners can integrate and apply developed estimation strategies into real project scenarios through worked example analysis
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
